name: Benoît Mandelbrot
alma_mater: École Polytechnique, California Institute of Technology, University of Paris
work_institutions: Yale University, International Business Machines(IBM), Pacific Northwest National Laboratory
known_for: Mandelbrot set, Fractals, The Chaos Theory
prizes: Wolf Prize (1993), Japan Prize (2003), The Franklin Medal, Légion d'honneur (the Legion of Honour)
